index.mainIntro:
Do you need a plagiarism check before releasing an album?
 Do you want to know if anyone has plagiarized your music? You can check the two things at once for free.

1.title:
Music IP Protection & 
Management Solution
1.content1:
Start a free AI music plagiarism test 
with MIPP's music analysis technology
 to avoid legal issues before releasing your album.
1.content2: We can identify plagiarized music from billions of songs released globally every day. Safeguard your music IP with our real-time plagiarism monitoring service.
1.content3: Through MIPP, protect your copyrights from unauthorized plagiarized songs and maximize revenue from your music IP.

3.title: Introduction
3.content1: AI divides thousands of songs into four-bar segments and compares their substantive similarities to identify songs with high levels of plagiarism.
3.content2: To protect creators' copyrights and intellectual property, and further to create a music ecosystem that maximizes the value of creativity.
3.content3: Through AI music analysis technology, it analyzes the structure, rhythm, melody, harmony, and more to detect plagiarized songs. It identifies plagiarized songs among many and safeguards the original creators' music intellectual property (IP).

howtouse.title: Discover How MIPP Elevates Your Music Experience
howtouse.content1: Get peace of mind before your big release! Our plagiarism checker ensures your tracks are unique. Avoid legal troubles and protect your music's identity with our easy-to-use, AI-powered tool.
howtouse.content2: Buying a new composition? Double-check its originality with us. Our quick plagiarism checker gives you the confidence that your new music stands out from the crowd.
howtouse.content3: If you believe you've discovered a copycat of your favorite tune? Put your mind at ease by checking its originality with our service. It's fast, and could save the day for your beloved artist.
howtouse.content4: Investing in music? Make sure it's a hit, not a miss. Our plagiarism tool helps you invest smart by confirming the uniqueness of your next big music venture.
howtouse.step1content: Join us in a snap! Sign up and log in using your Google email for a quick start.
howtouse.step2content: Select "Music file(mp3, wav)" or "YouTube/SoundCloud link" option. Choose whether your track includes vocals or is purely instrumental for a customized check.
howtouse.step3content: Upload your tracks or paste your music links – it's as simple as that.
howtouse.step4content: Our system conducts an in-depth plagiarism analysis, comparing your music against the top 5 matches in our database. We focus on melody similarities over a 4-bar sequence, highlighting section with a suspected plagiarism
howtouse.step5content: We provide a detailed breakdown of similarities, pinpointing specific sections for your review. Plus, you can listen to snippets.
howtouse.step6content: Grab your detailed plagiarism report in a handy PDF format. It's perfect for keeping records or sharing with your team.
